CellList Class Reference

Dijkstra algorithm used to see what goals a box can reach and with how many pushes it could. More...

#include <DijkstraBox.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Dijkstra algorithm used to see what goals a box can reach and with how many pushes it could.

This is a special representation of dijkstra because we want to keep possible positions of the pusher after each push. Each box position is represented by 4 nodes : left, up, right and down. Value in each node means "I can push this box in there by pushing it from left/up/right/down with a total of VALUE pushes"
